snippet: In his first trip to Europe as Treasury secretary, Jacob J. Lew will try to persuade finance ministers of other nations to pursue more growth and less austerity.
abstract: Jacob J Lew, commencing first European trip as Treasury secretary, will try to persuade finance ministers to pursue more growth and less austerity; Obama administration, along with several European officials, is concerned about potential cycle of austerity and recession wherein budget cuts lead to shrinking economies.
lead_paragraph: In his first trip to Europe as Treasury secretary, Jacob J. Lew will try to persuade finance ministers of other nations to pursue more growth and less austerity.

headline.seo: In Europe, Lew Will Press for More Growth, Less Austerity
headline.main: Lew to Press for European Policy Changes
headline.print_headline: Lew to Press For Growth In Europe
